testGuidance:
Select this test image 'Tests/InputTestImages/Test_8bit_YX_BinaryCylinder1_MaxIP.tif'
Then press Open.
When the prompt asks you if you want to select more images, click YES and select the image 'Tests/InputTestImages/Test_8bit_YX_BinaryCylinder2_MaxIP.tif'
Then Press Open
When the prompt asks you if you want to select more images, hit NO.
